interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Silverado
Review Date: 2017/08/22
Store: Kevin Kline  (Actor),     Scott Glenn  (Actor),     Lawrence Kasdan  (Director)    &                   0                  more   Rated:    PG-13    Format: VHS Tape
Categories: Movies & TV, Studio Specials, Sony Pictures Home Entertainment, All Sony Pictures Titles
Product Description: ["Director Lawrence Kasdan (The Big Chill) clearly set out to make an old-fashioned Western, but he couldn't help bringing a hip, self-conscious attitude to the proceedings. Silverado thus finds its own funky tone--sometimes rousing, sometimes winking. Four cowpokes converge on a little Western burg called Silverado; they're played by Kevin Kline (a distinctly modern kind of Western hero), Scott Glenn, Danny Glover, and the rowdy young Kevin Costner. Kasdan peppers the somewhat generic action with smart dialogue and a parade of quirky supporting players, including John Cleese as a sheriff who seems to have stepped straight from a Monty Python sketch into an Old West saloon. Bruce Broughton supplies the music, a real throwback to the glory days of thundering Western themes. One thing's for sure: Silverado's a lot more fun than the later Kasdan-Costner Western, Wyatt Earp. --Robert Horton"]
Average Rating: 4.8
Product Details: {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '7.32 x 4.19 x 1.12 inches; 6.13 Ounces', 'Director': 'Lawrence Kasdan', 'Release date': 'June 1, 1999', 'Date First Available': 'October 25, 2006', 'Actors': 'Kevin Kline, Scott Glenn, Kevin Costner, Danny Glover, Marvin J. McIntyre', 'Studio': 'Sony Pictures'}
Review Text: The movie was great, and I well buy more from them  Richard
Review Title: Good co....
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------

profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Preferred Format:** VHS tapes
- **Genre Affinity:** Strong interest in Western films, with a focus on classic and modern interpretations within this genre.
- **Rating Behavior:** Typically rates purchases highly, often giving a maximum rating (5.0), reflecting satisfaction with acquired titles.
- **Review Engagement:** Actively participates in providing feedback on products, showing a desire to share experiences and contribute to the community.
- **Future Intentions:** Plans to continue purchasing VHS movies, demonstrating a commitment to the format and genre while seeking both nostalgic and contemporary Westerns.

Recent interactions highlight the user's appreciation for films that blend traditional Western elements with a modern twist. They express enthusiasm for movies featuring iconic actors and notable directors, reinforcing their affinity for quality storytelling and character-driven narratives. Their consistent high ratings and engaging reviews illustrate a proactive approach to content feedback, suggesting an intent to influence and assist fellow enthusiasts in their selection of Western films. Overall, the user maintains a focused interest in the Western genre, particularly valuing both classic and more innovative takes within this cinematic landscape.
